question: Which nation has the largest solar power capacity of the installed photovoltaic system in the world?
explanation: China has the largest solar power capacity of the installed photovoltaic system in the world. It has 204,700 MW of the installed photovoltaic solar power system capacity in the world. It accounts for one-third of global installed solar capacity. China houses the third-largest photovoltaic power station in the world, Tenegger Desert Solar Park with 1547 MW capacity.
